Great news, Math Learners! We are making a major update to our User Interface, and learning Math has become more fun! Unlock Gifts and more Play Modes with new Levels!

And there's more... introducing, Speak your Answer! Try our new Siri-powered Speech Recognition and tell us the answer to many Math exercises!

Keep learning!

Great news, Math Learners! We are making a major update to our User Interface, and learning Math has become more fun! Unlock Gifts and more Play Modes with new Levels!


And there's more... introducing, Speak your Answer! Try our new Siri-powered Speech Recognition and tell us the answer to many Math exercises!


Keep learning!
